Issue.creator: swetharepakula
Issue.summary: GetTransactionReceipt docs should explain the status field
Issue.description: In the Fab3 Instructions, the GetTransactionReceipt section should document the meaning behind status. It should include "0x1" means that the transaction has been added to the ledger and was marked valid and that "0x0" means that transaction has been added to the ledger but was marked invalid so the effects of the transaction did not occur.
